hanzi-su-wiki:
飼

Значения

Выкармливать, держать (животных)

Мнемоника

Управлять 司 кормлением 食 — выкармливать.

Варианты

飼, 饲
purpleculture_pinyin:
sì
to raise; to rear; to feed
поднять; сзади; кормить
rtega_mnemonic:
飴飴RS
饴饴		䬮飼𥹋𨭄𩛛𩛮 𩞫sweet-meats, sweet-cakes, syrup
  • food 飠 to reward the speaking individual 台

飼飼RS
饲饲		raise animals, feed, nourish
  • take charge 司 of the food 飠
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 饲)
Pictophonetic: 司 indicates the sound; 飠 (food) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
飼料 [ sì liào ]: feed; fodder
飼養 [ sì yǎng ]: to raise; to rear
飼草 [ sì cǎo ]: forage grass
飼養員 [ sì yǎng yuán ]: zookeeper; stockman; breeder (of livestock, dogs or poultry etc)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 飠 [ shí ] food; to eat
    • 司 [ sī ] to take charge of, to control, to manage; officer
heisig_chinese_memo: You direct the food into your mouth and then it comes out of your rear. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: domesticate, eat, food, umbrella, good, halo, drop, silver, director, Ken Russel, clothes hanger, coat hanger, one, mouth
heisig_story: Eat . . . director. The sense is of rearing of animals.
koohiiStory1: When you DOMESTICATE a animal, you are the DIRECTOR of it´s life and what it EATS.
koohiiStory2: After a pride of hungry lions ate the director, the producer decided to tone down his documentary and film domesticated cats instead.
jp_example_words:
飼育(しいく): breeding, raising, rearing
飼う(かう): keep, raise, feed
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You eat part of a director to domesticate him. This director has been going around kicking cameramen and punching actors and it’s really ruining his reputation. You need to domesticate him. The only way to do this is to shock him into submission. His ego is so big from two blockbusters that you have to eat part of him to get him to calm down.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Which part of the director did you choose to eat in order to domesticate him? Think about eating that part of the director and imagine its taste in your mouth as you chew. Eww.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While you did succeed in your attempt to domesticate the director, he is now bleeding profusely from the bite wound. All over the script! You gotta get your car (か) and drive him to the hospital like right away. Get to the car! Hurry!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You’re proud that you managed to domesticate the director, but now you feel kind of bad for having injured him. Okay, you really just feel bad because he’s probably going to sue you and he definitely has a lot of money. Oh, and he’s bleeding all over your car.
Ru_Radicals: 亅 (зазубрина), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 口 (рот), 艮 (северо-восток), 食 (еда)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you administer (司) food (飠) to the animals you're raising
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You can enjoy eating food, then take a rest, and after a while you will rear (rise up) to go to the bathroom so you butt can take charge of letting it out.
humanum_full_description_en: From " food " to " secret " sound. The original meaning is for people or animals to eat. "Jade articles. Food Department: "Feeding, the same food. Food, food." Such as "The Songs of the Chu." Seven remonstrances. Resent the World": "The son pushes himself off and feeds the emperor, the German and Japanese are forgotten and the grievance is deep." "Helv Internal Biography Fourth": "I tasted hunger here, begging for food from a woman, and the woman fed me, so she threw water and died." Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Dispelling Doubts": "I used powdered mulberry to feed silkworms, and the silkworms reached ten. The moon is not old." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty, "Gufeng": "Mu Jin is not here, and people feed the jackals."
humanum_short_description_en: From " food " to " si " sound. The original meaning is for people or animals to eat.
humanum_full_description: 從「食」，「司」聲。本義是給人或畜吃。《玉篇．食部》：「飼，同飤。飤，食也。」如《楚辭．七諫．怨世》：「子推自割而飼君兮，德日忘而怨深。」《吳越春秋．闔閭內傳第四》：「吾嘗饑於此，乞食於一女子，女子飼我，遂投水而亡。」三國魏曹植〈釋疑論〉：「又以藥粉桑以飼蠶，蠶乃到十月不老。」唐代李白〈古風〉：「牧今不在，邊人飼豺虎。」
humanum_short_description: 從「食」，「司」聲。本義是給人或畜吃。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
飼 (Simplified: 饲)
Pinyin: sì
English Definition: to raise; to rear; to feed
Total strokes: 14; Radical: 食
Pictophonetic: 司 indicates the sound; 飠 (food) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 飠 [ shí ] food; to eat
    • 司 [ sī ] to take charge of, to control, to manage; officer
Example Words:
飼料 [ sì liào ]: feed; fodder
飼養 [ sì yǎng ]: to raise; to rear
飼草 [ sì cǎo ]: forage grass
飼養員 [ sì yǎng yuán ]: zookeeper; stockman; breeder (of livestock, dogs or poultry etc)
More: 飼* | *飼 | *飼*

從「 食 」，「 司 」聲。本義是給人或畜吃。《玉篇．食部》：「飼，同飤。飤，食也。」如《楚辭．七諫．怨世》：「子推自割而飼君兮，德日忘而怨深。」《吳越春秋．闔閭內傳第四》：「吾嘗饑於此，乞食於一女子，女子飼我，遂投水而亡。」三國魏曹植〈釋疑論〉：「又以藥粉桑以飼蠶，蠶乃到十月不老。」唐代李白〈古風〉：「牧今不在，邊人飼豺虎。」
From " food" to " secret" sound. The original meaning is for people or animals to eat. "Jade articles. Food Department: "Feeding, the same food. Food, food." Such as "The Songs of the Chu." Seven remonstrances. Resent the World": "The son pushes himself off and feeds the emperor, the German and Japanese are forgotten and the grievance is deep." "Helv Internal Biography Fourth": "I tasted hunger here, begging for food from a woman, and the woman fed me, so she threw water and died." Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Dispelling Doubts": "I used powdered mulberry to feed silkworms, and the silkworms reached ten. The moon is not old." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty, "Gufeng": "Mu Jin is not here, and people feed the jackals."

飼字的基本解释

飼
sì
见“饲”。

飼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sì］
［《廣韻》祥吏切，去志，邪。］
“饲1”的繁体字。亦作“飤1”。亦作“飴2”。
(1)拿食物给人吃。
(2)饲养，给动物吃东西。

飼字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　飼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1418第36
【玉篇】同飤。

飼字的源字形

暂无。

sì
вм. 饲
Radicals: 食, 司  (eat, director)
Meaning Mnemonic
You eat part of a director to domesticate him. This director has been going around kicking cameramen and punching actors and it’s really ruining his reputation. You need to domesticate him. The only way to do this is to shock him into submission. His ego is so big from two blockbusters that you have to eat part of him to get him to calm down.
Which part of the director did you choose to eat in order to domesticate him? Think about eating that part of the director and imagine its taste in your mouth as you chew. Eww.
Reading Mnemonic
While you did succeed in your attempt to domesticate the director, he is now bleeding profusely from the bite wound. All over the script! You gotta get your car (か) and drive him to the hospital like right away. Get to the car! Hurry!
You’re proud that you managed to domesticate the director, but now you feel kind of bad for having injured him. Okay, you really just feel bad because he’s probably going to sue you and he definitely has a lot of money. Oh, and he’s bleeding all over your car.
